articles.description: CAMILLA, Duchess of Cornwall has received the Queen's approval to be known as Queen Consort in the future. So why will Camilla never truly be Queen?
articles.content: Camilla's steadfast commitment to charitable causes, such as supporting people affected by domestic violence, has endeared Camilla to many people, and it appears swathes are now in favour of a future… [+614 chars]
